summary_comment: The professor demonstrates a strong commitment to helping students, showing diligence in her approach. While she does not use a textbook, relying instead on scanned readings that can be challenging to understand, her quizzes are relatively straightforward. Students who put in the necessary effort tend to perform well, finding the course manageable overall.

Ratings.comment: Can tell she is trying to help.Diligent. No textbook but a lot of scanned readings. Some readings are hard to understand and quiz questions sometimes a little bit confusing (they are relatively easy though)put effort in = good grade. So far OK.

summary_comment: The professor graded assignments inconsistently, primarily using a complete/incomplete system with little feedback until near the end of the semester. Despite this, extra credit opportunities were provided, and the assignments tended to be easy.

Ratings.comment: Graded almost everything complete/incomplete. Didn't grade anything from the first couple weeks until towards the very end of the semester. Grading was inconsistent also. Extra credit made available. Easy assignments.
